SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain

Class Game

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Game
public final class Game extends Object
The Game class encapsulates the essential attributes of a game of UNO. This class provides methods to retrieve game details.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Game.GameState
    Enumeration representing the various game states a game of UNO can be in at any given point in time.
    static enum 
    Game.MoveState
    Enumeration representing whether a move submitted is valid or not.
